07-10-2006, 03:24 PM #1 luvfreebies View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Location Foothills of the Smokies Posts 1,844 $50 Rebate for ordering Showtime Order SHOWTIME and get a $50 rebate Call now 1-866-SHOW (7469) http://www.sho.com/site/order/rebate...questid=156752
To receive your $50 rebate from SHOWTIME, simply print your name and address below and mail along with your first two months cable bills dated between 3/31/06 and 2/28/07, indicating your new SHOWTIME subscription to:
SHOWTIME $50 Rebate Offer P.O. Box 3125 Dept. C Grand Rapids, MN 55745-3125
Rebate is available to new SHOWTIME subscribers only. This rebate cannot be combined with any other SHOWTIME promotional offer. Limit one SHOWTIME promotional offer per household in any 12-month period. Your rebate will be mailed to you within 8-10 weeks after the receipt of the above mentioned documents. Keep a copy for your files. Your response must be postmarked by 3/15/07 and received by 3/31/07.
